description: **Tool Overview**: This update is designed to enhance the Windows Recovery Environment for Windows 10 (version 21H2 and 22H2) and is released periodically to improve functionality and security. **Details**: This update addresses various improvements and fixes within the recovery environment which might include enhancements to the diagnostic tools and repair capabilities. By applying this update, system administrators can ensure that the recovery options available during boot are up-to-date and efficient. It is essential for maintaining the overall health of the Windows operating systems within enterprise environments. The detailed explanation for this Tool is provided in the Fix description.
